title: Pattie Mallette shares Justin Bieber and Hailey Baldwin wedding photos
text:
The wedding is over but Justin Bieber's friends and family are still reliving the big day.

Pattie Mallette, the 25-year-old pop star's mom, took to Instagram to share some sweet snaps from the wedding day with her son.

Justin and Hailey Baldwin said 'I do' again at a lavish wedding held at the Montage Palmetto Bluff in South Carolina on Monday which cost over a million dollars.

Mother and son: Justin Bieber's mom Pattie Mallette took to Instagram to share some sweet snaps from his lavish wedding to Hailey Baldwin in a new post on Friday

Her mother-of-the-groom moment was captured in black and white in the portrait booth that the celebrity couple mad available to guests

'What a whirlwind So proud,' Pattie captioned the images. 'Happy ever after baby.'

Pattie looked glamorous in the shots wearing a dark gown with her long brunette hair down and a pair of dangling earrings.

She and Justin smiled sweetly together and he wrapped his arms around his beloved mom. In the second photo, Pattie is seen looking up at her son adoringly.

'What a whirlwind So proud,' Pattie captioned the images. 'Happy ever after baby.'

Justin had taken off his tuxedo jacket for the photo session and a peek of his custom made bottom grill was visible in his mouth.

When the celebrity pair tied the knot in secret last year at a Manhattan courthouse, neither sets of their parents were invited.

The Biebers were married for the second time earlier this week at the luxury Montage Palmetto Bluffs hotel in Bluffton, South Carolina.

The event kicked off in style with a rehearsal dinner at Moreland Landing, a small banqueting hall on the property, on Sunday evening.

Over the top: Justin and Hailey Baldwin said 'I do' again at a lavish wedding held at the Montage Palmetto Bluff in South Carolina on Monday which cost over a million dollars

Justin and Hailey traveled to the venue with their guests in a flotilla of small boats – each of which flew flags bearing red hearts.

Photos exclusively obtained by DailyMail.com show the moment Bieber and Hailey arrived at the cocktail party and posed for pictures on the jetty.

The following night, guests joined Bieber and his bride for a sunset wedding at the Somerset Chapel next to the hotel and a $390-a-head reception inside the Wilson Ballroom.

Family finally: The celebrity couple originally tied the knot in a secret courthouse wedding in New York last year but neither of their sets of parents were invited

Back home: Hailey and Justin are putting off their honeymoon until a later date and the young model showed off her wedding band set from Tiffany & Co. when she returned home to Los Angeles

Guests included Kendall and Kylie Jenner, their mother Kris, Justin's manager Scooter Braun, Hailey's cousin Ireland Baldwin and R&B singer Usher.

The simple menu at the reception featured steak and salad, with the food washed down by bottles of Moet & Chandon Imperial champagne, personalized with the couple's names and the date of their wedding.

Although the festivities continued into the early hours, the couple threw a farewell brunch on Tuesday morning at Buffalo's – a southern comfort food restaurant in the hotel grounds.

Justin and Hailey returned home to Los Angeles after the wedding festivities via a private jet and are holding off on a honeymoon.

New tunes: Riding the high of his wedding excitement, Justin also released a new single this week called 10,000 Hours with Dan + Shay

Meanwhile, the singer released a new romantic single on Thursday called 10,000 Hours with Dan + Shay.

'I'd spend 10,000 hours and 10,000 more, oh, if that's what it takes to learn that sweet heart of yours,' the newlywed croons in the chorus.

'And I might never get there, but I'm gonna try. If it's 10,000 hours or the rest of my life, I'm gonna love you,' sings Justin.

He had referred to the then-upcoming single as 'Wedding music,' while promoting it on Twitter.
